publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1435# Frances Curran: Glasgow Central College - Failure to Reinstate-That the Parliament notes with concern the failure of the board of management of the Central College of Commerce in Glasgow to reinstate Mr Jim O'Donovan, the National President of the Further Education Lecturers' Association of the Educational Institute of Scotland, within the requisite timescale laid down by the employment tribunal, which found he had been unfairly dismissed because of his trade union activities, and considers that he should be reinstated immediately. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1435# Glasgow Central College - Failure to Reinstate (lodged on 8 June 2004) Chris Ballance*, Rosie Kane*, Alex Neil*

S2M-1435# Frances Curran: Glasgow Central College - Failure to Reinstate-That the Parliament notes with concern the failure of the board of management of the Central College of Commerce in Glasgow to reinstate Mr Jim O'Donovan, the National President of the Further Education Lecturers' Association of the Educational Institute of Scotland, within the requisite timescale laid down by the employment tribunal, which found he had been unfairly dismissed because of his trade union activities, and considers that he should be reinstated immediately. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Rosie Kane, Alex Neil, Elaine Smith*
S2M-1435# Glasgow Central College - Failure to Reinstate (lodged on 8 June 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Robin Harper*
S2M-1435# Glasgow Central College - Failure to Reinstate (lodged on 8 June 2004) Colin Fox*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1435# Glasgow Central College - Failure to Reinstate (lodged on 8 June 2004) Dennis Canavan*
